title: Easy salt and pepper chicken pieces
ingredients: ['1 large green pepper', '1 large onion', '2 garlic cloves', '2 green or red chillies (or one of each)', '3-4 chicken breasts', '90g breadcrumbs', '3-4 pinches of salt', '3-4 pinches of sugar', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil (or olive oil for extra flavour)']
